attributes.action: For HM Government to veto any attempt for a second Scottish independence vote.
attributes.background: We the undersigned, in the interest of national unity, call on HM Government to reject any attempt of a second referendum on Scottish independence. The SNP government of Nicola Sturgeon, re-elected in May 2016, has no majority and therefore does NOT have a mandate for a second referendum.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
